activities: Omega World Travel, Inc. collects personal information from the employees and agents of various entities which may be a part of the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland.  The personal information is for the purposes of procuring travel services only and is commonly referred to as a travel profile.  Such information would include name, company, company address, phone and various personal account numbers related to specific services such as a frequent flyer information.  Other personal information may include preffered travel vendors to include airlines, hotels and car rental agencies.  Additional information would include restrictions on travel such as a maximum per diem rate.  Financial or other sensitive data is usually only associated with the entity as opposed to the individual, but in some cases we may electronically store personal financial information.
personaldata: Data collected by Omega would include "personal information" to the extent necessary to provide travel services.  The only "sensitive personal information" as defined may be entity affiliation as most travlers using our services are with a company or government organization.
